<|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 418, 230, 434]]<|/det|>
## INSTRUCTIONS  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 435, 850, 621]]<|/det|>
INSTRUCTIONS- Answer all questions.- Use a black or dark blue pen. You may use an HB pencil for any diagrams or graphs.- Write your name, centre number and candidate number in the boxes at the top of the page.- Write your answer to each question in the space provided.- Do not use an erasable pen or correction fluid.- Do not write on any bar codes.- You should use a calculator where appropriate.- You may use tracing paper.- You must show all necessary working clearly.- Give non-exact numerical answers correct to 3 significant figures, or 1 decimal place for angles in degrees, unless a different level of accuracy is specified in the question.- For \(\pi\), use either your calculator value or 3.142.  

<|ref|>sub_title<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 650, 219, 665]]<|/det|>
## INFORMATION  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 666, 730, 699]]<|/det|>
INFORMATION- The total mark for this paper is 104.- The number of marks for each question or part question is shown in brackets [ ].

<label>3</label>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[116, 71, 764, 91]]<|/det|>
Mr Zhang, his wife and three children go on a holiday from Shanghai to Auckland.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[114, 102, 144, 120]]<|/det|>
<label>(a)</label>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 102, 423, 121]]<|/det|>
The flight for an adult costs \(\)630.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 119, 482, 141]]<|/det|>
The cost for a child is \(\frac{5}{8}\) of the adult cost.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 151, 845, 171]]<|/det|>
Show that the total cost of the flight for the family is \(\)2441$, correct to the nearest dollar.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[890, 352, 920, 371]]<|/det|>
<mark>[3]

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[114, 384, 146, 403]]<|/det|>
<label>(b)</label>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 384, 667, 403]]<|/det|>
The plane leaves Shanghai at 20 05 local time on 13th November.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 400, 549, 419]]<|/det|>
The plane stops for 2 hours 30 minutes in Sydney.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 416, 680, 435]]<|/det|>
The plane lands in Auckland at 17 25 local time on 14th November.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 432, 732, 450]]<|/det|>
The local time in Auckland is 5 hours ahead of the local time in Shanghai.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[154, 462, 181, 481]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[193, 462, 667, 481]]<|/det|>
